Podcasts Featuring Sonu Kapoor – Angular Catch-Up & Guest Appearances

I co-host shows and appear on podcasts to talk Angular, Signals, SSR, and modern frontend architecture. Here’s a curated list of episodes and series.

Angular Catchup — Co-hosted Series

Podcast Series

A show I co-host covering Angular, performance, SSR, and modern patterns with leaders from the Angular team and community.

Listen to the show →

httpResource in Angular — The Future of API Communication

Guest: Alex Rickabaugh • Angular Catchup

Deep dive into the signal-based HttpResource API and how it simplifies async state and type-safe data flows.

Listen →

Testing Done Right: Where to Start, What to Use, and What’s Next

Guest: Rainer Hahnekamp • Angular Catchup

Avoid flaky tests and maintenance nightmares with practical strategies that actually add value.

Listen →

Angular v19 — Advanced Features

Guest: Minko Gechev • Angular Catchup

Partial Hydration, Reactivity, security, HMR and more—what’s landing and how to use it.

Listen →

SSR in Angular v19 — A New Era of Performance

Guest: Alan Agius • Angular Catchup

What the latest SSR updates mean for performance, SEO, and developer experience.

Listen →

Angular SSR Deep Dive

Guest: Jessica Janiuk • Angular Catchup

Hydration, scaling SSR apps, AnalogJS support, and real-world tips.

Listen →

Unpacking SignalStore

Guests: Alex Okrushko & Marko Stanimirović • Angular Catchup

Why SignalStore is shaping the future of state management and how to adopt it.

Listen →

Angular v18 — Advanced Features

Guest: Minko Gechev • Angular Catchup

What shipped in v18 and how it changes app architecture and DX.

Listen →

Signals with Paweł Kozłowski

Guest: Paweł Kozłowski • Angular Catchup

Signals best practices, capabilities, challenges, and future direction.

Listen →
